animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces up and down

animation_type_settings_data.name: Flash
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element alternates between 0 and 100% opacity

animation_type_settings_data.name: Pulse
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands and contracts, maintaining dimensions

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rubber Band
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands and contracts, maintaining dimensions

animation_type_settings_data.name: Shake
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element shakes left to right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Swing
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element swings left to right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Tada
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element contracts, expands and shakes

animation_type_settings_data.name: Wobble
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element wobbles left to right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce In
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces in from center

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce In Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces in from top

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce In Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces in from left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce In Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces in from right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce In Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces in from bottom

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce Out
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces and appears to shrink in to center

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce Out Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces and drops out of view

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce Out Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces and slides left out of view

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce Out Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces and slides right out of view

animation_type_settings_data.name: Bounce Out Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element bounces and slides up out of view

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides down from top

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Down Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides down from top

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides in from left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Left Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides in from left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides in from right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Right Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides in from right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides in from bottom

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade In Up Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, and slides in from bottom

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides down

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Down Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides down

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides out to left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Left Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides out to left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides out to right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Right Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides out to right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides up from bottom

animation_type_settings_data.name: Fade Out Up Big
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity, and slides up from bottom

animation_type_settings_data.name: Flip
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands, and rotates 360 degrees on Y axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Flip In X
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element flips on X axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Flip In Y
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element flips on Y axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Flip Out X
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and flips on X axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Flip Out Y
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and flips on Y axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Light Speed In
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, changes to rhombus and slides in from right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Light Speed Out
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity, changes to rhombus and slides out to right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element rotates 360 degrees on center axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Down Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element rotates down from top on left bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Up Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element rotates up on left bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Down Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element rotates down from top on right bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Up Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element rotates up from bottom on right bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate In
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity and rotates 360 degrees on center axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate In Down Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity and rotates down from top on left bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate In Up Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity and rotates up on left bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate In Down Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity and rotates down from top on right bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate In Up Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and rotates up from bottom on right bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Out
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and rotates 360 degrees on center axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Out Down Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and rotates down from top on left bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Out Up Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and rotates up on left bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Out Down Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and rotates down from top on right bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Rotate Out Up Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and rotates up from bottom on right bottom corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Hinge
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element hangs from left top corner axis and then slides down

animation_type_settings_data.name: Roll In
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element gains opacity while rotating in from left on bottom left corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Roll Out
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity while rotating out to right on bottom right corner axis

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom In
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands from center

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom In Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands while sliding in from top

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom In Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands while sliding in from left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom In Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands while sliding in from right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element expands while sliding in from bottom

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom Out
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element loses opacity and contracts to center

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom Out Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element contracts while sliding down

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom Out Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element contracts while sliding left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom Out Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element contracts while sliding right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Zoom Out Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element contracts while sliding up

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide In Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides down

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide In Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide In Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide In Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides up

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide Out Down
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides down

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide Out Left
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides left

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide Out Right
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides right

animation_type_settings_data.name: Slide Out Up
animation_type_settings_data.description: Element slides up
